result.title: Train-the-Trainer programme and advanced Experiential Learning tools to use during the training sessions
result.description: Ideate a first set-up of the training, based on ECE’s research – and experience-based knowledge about organising a Train-the-Trainer programme, complemented with the most recent advancements in the field (research and best practices). UL leads the module on open science. Share this initial set-up of the training with all consortium partners for a first review.ECE hosts the 4-day Train the Trainer programme on their campus with the selected teaching staff from the project partners.• ECE executes the modules about entrepreneurship and open innovation, a trainer from UL is responsible for the open science module and a trainer from ST DOTSPACE is responsible for familiarising the teaching staff with the format and process of the career-oriented masterclass.• Ideation on the integration of the skills training with existing or new curricula at the local level with participating teaching staff. Co-develop a roadmap with the participants to tailor the course to the local ecosystem in their respective countries.• The programme is facilitated face-to-face, but ECE will ensure the feasibility of an online version, should it become impossible for all participants to have a physical gathering.• Organise a one-day tour for the participants in the Train-the-Trainer programme to showcase the Dutch entrepreneurial ecosystem, and especially the role of a knowledge institution therein, in a sector to be determined together with the consortium partners (e.g. logistics).

programme.title: Make scientific and technological careers attractive to young students, and forster sustainable interaction between schools, research institutions, industry and civil society organisations

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Co-created skills training for PhD candidates to be implemented in each HEI and roadmap of the local implementation strategy
result.description: • Develop the structure and the programme of the training, based on the inputs from Tasks 2.1-2.2, the concepts of open science (including RRI, gender and ethics), open innovation and entrepreneurship and career-orientation, including a daily agenda, the involvement of external speakers and the development of materials. ULEI develops the open science module and ST DOTSPACE develops career-oriented training in the form of a masterclass.• Invite all partners to provide feedback on the programme for validation before the official launch. ECE hosts a kick-off webinar for the selected participants to activate and motivate them for the Train-the-Trainer programme and introduce them to the topics of the course.• After completion of the Train-the-Trainer programme, the acquired expertise is used to finalise the training programme.
